dataSource.staticValue: The Automated Customer Account Transfer Regulatory Report for full transfers for the month of
indicated a need to improve the processing of customer account transfers by your organization.
Your organization processed a total of
FINRA rules on customer transfer states that the entire customer account transfer process must be completed within four (4) business days for cash, margin, IRA and qualified corporate plan accounts.

Based upon the above statistics, it would appear that your organization is not adhering to the provision of this rule. Please provide FINRA with a detailed written explanation of the reasons causing the noted exception(s). We would also like a detailed description of the methods undertaken to correct any deficiencies. We will expect a response within one week from the receipt of this letter.
We wish to advise you that continuing to exceed FINRA criteria for ACATS compliance can result in further action being taken by FINRA.
If you should have any questions regarding this matter, please give me a call at

detailFilter.filterExpression:
[REQST_ACATS Business Layer].[ACATS_FIRM_FULL_HS_VW].[XCPTN_PRD_DT]
between
to_date( to_char( ?from_year?) + '-' + to_char(?from_month?) , 'YYYY-MM')
AND
to_date( to_char( ?to_year?) + '-' + to_char(?to_month?) , 'YYYY-MM')
